source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT TABLE_NAME 
FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES
WHERE TABLE_TYPE = 'BASE TABLE' AND TABLE_SCHEMA='SalesLT'

sqlReaderQuery.value: select DepartmentID, JobTitle from HumanResources.EmployeeDepartmentHistory  join HumanResources.Employee on HumanResources.EmployeeDepartmentHistory.BusinessEntityID = HumanResources.Employee.BusinessEntityID  where departmentid =@{item().departmentid}

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select name as table_name
from sys.tables
where schema_name(schema_id) = 'HumanResources'

select  c.firstname+ ' ' + c.lastname + ' bought ' + p.name + ' from '  + c.salesperson + ' worth ' + cast (so.linetotal as nvarchar)  from [SalesLT].[SalesOrderDetail] so join [SalesLT].[SalesOrderHeader] sh on sh.salesorderid = so.salesorderid  join [SalesLT].[Product] p on so.productid = p.productid     join    [SalesLT].[Customer]  c on c.customerid = sh.customerid
select distinct year (ModifiedDate ) as y , month (ModifiedDate) as m , day (ModifiedDate) as d , modifieddate as dt from Sales.SalesOrderDetail

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	dept as integer
}
source(output(
		BusinessEntityID as integer,
		DepartmentID as integer,
		ShiftID as integer,
		StartDate as date,
		EndDate as date,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source1 split(DepartmentID ==  $dept,
	disjoint: true) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(givenDept, other)
ConditionalSplit1@givenDept sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1

source(output(
		BookID as integer,
		{Book Title} as string,
		{Book Price} as decimal(19,4)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source1 split({Book Price} > 540,
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(booksgreaterthan540, other)
ConditionalSplit1@booksgreaterthan540 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	mapColumn(
		BookID,
		{Book Title},
		{Book Price}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
ConditionalSplit1@other sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	mapColumn(
		BookID,
		{Book Title},
		{Book Price}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink2

source(output(
		salespersonid as integer,
		totaldue as decimal(19,4)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source1 aggregate(groupBy(salespersonid),
	totaldue = sum (totaldue)) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['SalesBySalePerson'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		ListPrice as decimal(19,4),
		Size as string,
		Weight as decimal(8,2),
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		ProductModelID as integer,
		SellStartDate as timestamp,
		SellEndDate as timestamp,
		DiscontinuedDate as timestamp,
		ThumbNailPhoto as binary,
		ThumbnailPhotoFileName as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select * from [SalesLT].[Product]',
	format: 'query') ~> salesproduct
source(output(
		ProductId as integer,
		Name as string,
		color as string,
		standardcost as integer,
		listprise as integer,
		productcategoryid as integer,
		hashkey as string,
		inserteddate as timestamp,
		updateddate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> dimproduct
salesproduct derive(newHashKey = sha1( Name + ProductNumber + Color )) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1, dimproduct exists(newHashKey == hashkey,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
Exists1, dimproduct lookup(salesproduct@ProductID == dimproduct@ProductId,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 derive(newInsertedDate = iif(isNull(inserteddate) , currentTimestamp() , inserteddate  ),
		newUpdatedDate = currentTimestamp()) ~> DerivedColumn2
DerivedColumn2 alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		ProductId as integer,
		Name as string,
		color as string,
		standardcost as integer,
		listprise as integer,
		productcategoryid as integer,
		hashkey as string,
		inserteddate as timestamp,
		updateddate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['ProductId'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		ProductId = salesproduct@ProductID,
		Name = salesproduct@Name,
		color = salesproduct@Color,
		standardcost = salesproduct@StandardCost,
		listprise,
		productcategoryid = salesproduct@ProductCategoryID,
		hashkey = newHashKey,
		inserteddate = newInsertedDate,
		updateddate = newUpdatedDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1

source(output(
		CustomerID as integer,
		NameStyle as boolean,
		Title as string,
		FirstName as string,
		MiddleName as string,
		LastName as string,
		Suffix as string,
		CompanyName as string,
		SalesPerson as string,
		EmailAddress as string,
		Phone as string,
		PasswordHash as string,
		PasswordSalt as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SalesLTCustomer
source(output(
		CustomerID as integer,
		Title as string,
		FirstName as string,
		MiddleName as string,
		LastName as string,
		InsertedDate as timestamp,
		UpdatedDate as timestamp,
		HashKey as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DimCustomerSource
SalesLTCustomer derive(HashKey = sha1(FirstName+LastName+CompanyName)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1, DimCustomerSource exists(DerivedColumn1@HashKey == DimCustomerSource@HashKey,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
Exists1, DimCustomerSource lookup(SalesLTCustomer@CustomerID == DimCustomerSource@CustomerID,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 derive({InsertedDatenew } = iif(isNull(InsertedDate), currentTimestamp(),InsertedDate ),
		UpdatedDatenew = currentTimestamp()) ~> DerivedColumn2
DerivedColumn2 alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		CustomerID as integer,
		Title as string,
		FirstName as string,
		MiddleName as string,
		LastName as string,
		InsertedDate as timestamp,
		UpdatedDate as timestamp,
		HashKey as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['CustomerID'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		CustomerID = SalesLTCustomer@CustomerID,
		Title = SalesLTCustomer@Title,
		FirstName = SalesLTCustomer@FirstName,
		MiddleName = SalesLTCustomer@MiddleName,
		LastName = SalesLTCustomer@LastName,
		InsertedDate = {InsertedDatenew },
		UpdatedDate = UpdatedDatenew,
		HashKey = DerivedColumn1@HashKey
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
